  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085855</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Finding and using literary criticism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literarischer Kritik finden und mit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvant et en utilisant la critique littéraire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrando e usando o criticism literário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trovando ed usando critica letteraria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εύρεση και χρησιμοποίηση της λογοτεχνικής κριτικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encontrando y con crítica literaria</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A guide for high school students to finding and using literary criticism, in print and on the web.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anleitung für High School Kursteilnehmer zum
Finden und zum Verwenden der literarischen Kritik, im Druck und auf 
dem Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un guide pour des étudiants de lycée à trouver 
et à utiliser la critique littéraire, dans la copie et sur le Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma guia para estudantes da High School a 
encontrar e a usar o criticism literário, na cópia e no Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una guida per gli allievi della High School 
all'individuazione ed a usando della critica letteraria, in stampa e 
sul Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας οδηγός για τους σπουδαστές γυμνασίου στην εύρεση
και τη χρησιμοποίηση της λογοτεχνικής κριτικής, στην τυπωμένη ύλη
και στον Ιστό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una guía para los estudiantes de la High School 
secundaria a encontrar y a usar crítica literaria, en la impresión y
en el Web.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
